element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.COBRANDS_DEFAULT_GROUP
element.description: Specifies the default ACL Group with predefined ACL configurations that will be implicitly applicable to all Users under this cobrand.

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.SECURITY_NORMALIZATION_SERVICE.ENABLED
element.description: Key for enabling calling Security System Inputization Service Application to System Inputize the Securities. SN2.0 Feature Control key Key is used SN2.0, also used for SN3.0, in addition to this, we need to consider mongo DB key '' for Advanced Security Normalization

element.name: GENERAL_ADVISOR_AGGREGATION_TXN_SELECTION_DURATION
element.description: Key to configure Max Transaction Selection Duration for Advisor

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.COBRAND_VENDORS
element.description: To configure customer asset classification For Custom asset classification, then along with this Key, the 'is_custom_asset_class' should also be enabled from vendor table

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.SIMPLEDESCRIPTION.RULE.VERSION
element.description: Acl key to switch Simple Description derivation algorithm for a transaction. Default 1.0, derive the Simple Description rule based on Transaction Classification and Type/SubType. The valuse can be set to 1.1 to derive the Simple Description rule based on...

element.name: GENERAL_MEERKAT_BASED_SIMPLE_DESC_ENABLED
element.description: Enable Simple Description

element.name: GENERAL_MEERKAT_BASED_CATEGORIZATION_ENABLED
element.description: Enable TDE (Core Enrichment - Category, Merchant)

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.CATEGORIZATION_SERVICE.ENABLED
element.description: Switchable key to enable/disable Categorization Service. Categorization Service is a standalone service, categorized the transaction for Bank or Card transaction using Meerkat and / or Legacy.

element.name: TDE_SUPPORTED_VERSION
element.description: We have different versions for Transaction Data Enrichment. This ACL Key is to check the TDE Version enabled.

element.name: com.core.yodlee.meerkat.reapply.days
element.description: Number of transactions for which TDE needs to be applied while Failover

element.name: GENERAL_MEERKAT_BASED_GEO_LOCATION_ENABLED
element.description: Switchable key to enable/disable Meerkat based Geo Location Population

element.name: MEERKAT_SIMPLE_DESC_GEO_LOCATION_ENABLED
element.description: App-4148 -- This key is used to configure the presence of geolocation details in the simple description. By default, the geolocation details should be disabled, i.e., not be displayed.

element.name: com.yodlee.categorization.refine.categories.enabled
element.description: This Key is used to enable merging/renaming of categories. Reference : Story Id B-02448. This is parallel Categorisation, we are not enabling this for anyone

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.VERIFICATION_CD_DEBIT_ENABLED_FOR_BROKERAGE_ACCT
element.description: COM.YODLEE.CORE.VERIFICATION_CD_DEBIT_ENABLED_FOR_BROKERAGE_ACCT

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.ACCOUNT_VERIFICATION.CDV_ENABLED
element.description: Access Control for Challenge Deposit Verificaiton

element.name: COBRAND_NAME
element.description: Name of Client part of Yodlee communication.

element.name: GENERAL_USER_ROLE
element.description: Key to define User Role in the system.

element.name: COM.YODLEE.COBRAND.LOCALE.SUPPORTED
element.description: Specifies the locales supported by Client. Utilized to control user preferences during registration. Possible values are all possible Locales defined in our system. Probable usage will be for clients who cater to multiple regions or countries. Will be same as DEFAULT locale "COM.YODLEE.COBRAND.LOCALE.DEFAULT" if we have only one locale support. needs analysis on how config tool is going to present this

element.name: com.yodlee.core.dateFormat.default
element.description: Specifies the date format preference for client. Probable usage in API : where date is returned - Account, Transactions etc.

element.name: COM.YODLEE.COBRAND.LOCALE.DEFAULT
element.description: Used in ysl 1.1, needs analysis on how config tool is going to present this

element.name: com.yodlee.core.cobrand_timezone
element.description: Specifies the timezone of this client, utilized in User Registration and User preferences. Probable usage in API : Transaction Search, Account (Refresh details, Error Details).

element.name: com.yodlee.core.currency.default
element.description: Specifies the currency for this client, utilized in data retrieval API. Probable usage in API : where amounts are returned - Accounts, Transaction Search.

element.name: com.yodlee.core.currencyNotation.default
element.description: Specifies the notation of currency to be part of API respone & UX - Text/Symbol. Probable usage in API : where amounts are returned - Accounts, Transaction Search.

element.name: com.yodlee.core.groupPattern.default
element.description: Specifies where the separate should come for larger amounts. Probable usage in API : where amounts are returned - Accounts, Transaction Search.

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.FETCH_ALL_LOCALE_DATA_ENABLED
element.description: To enable fetching all localized data for a key

element.name: PREFERRED_DATE_FORMAT
element.description: User preferred date format

element.name: PREFERRED_NUMBER_FORMAT
element.description: Preferred format for number display in the application

element.name: PREFERRED_CURRENCY_FORMAT
element.description: Preferred Currency format for display in the application

element.name: COBRAND_COMPANY_NAME
element.description: Legal Company Name of client.

element.name: com.yodlee.compareme_new_flow_model_enabled
element.description: This is the key to determine whether cobrand is enabled for new model. Possible values:True/False

element.name: com.yodlee.compareme_new_flow_test_mode_value
element.description: This key will determines the value for what purpose it is enabled in testing mode.Possible Values:1(Old Model),2(Populate both Old and New Model),null or 0(Only New model)

element.name: GENERAL_DATA_EXTRACTS.EVENTS_NOTIFICATION_BATCH_SIZE
element.description: To indicate the notification split size for ysl api pagination for Data extract events feature

element.name: GENERAL_DATA_EXTRACTS.USER_DATA_PAGINATION_ENABLED
element.description: To indicate whether ysl api pagination for Data extract user data feature is supported or not

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.DATA_EXTRACTS.SUPPORTED_HELD_HELDAWAY_COLLECTIONS
element.description: This Acl restricts the Data Extracts response depending on the combination configure (HELDPREPOP,HELDNONPREPOP,HELDAWAY) using SumInfo's SumInfoPrepopModeId configured for a Cobrand.This is used in DataExtractController.java (YSL Component) and WebHookDa...

element.name: GENERAL_DATA_EXTRACTS.DAYS_COUNT_VALUE
element.description: Cobrand can fetch the data up to this value in past

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.DATAEXTRACTS.UPDATE_USER_LOGIN.REQUIRED
element.description: This is a flag to check if Last Login of an user is to be updated on Data Extracts - Get UserData call

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.DBFILER.VALIDATE_ITEM_SUMMARY_DATA_MODIFICATION.ENABLED
element.description: key to decide if the item summary data need to be validated for updates. should be enabled if dataextractsmanagement apis are turned on

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.DATAEXTRACTS.USER_UNREGISTER_INFO.REQUIRED
element.description: To configure cobrand specific DataExtract API response to be exposed for DATAEXTRACTS USER_UNREGISTER which is developed on top of SDG.

element.name: GENERAL_DATA_EXTRACTS.DATE_TIME_DIFFERENCE_IN_SECONDS
element.description: Cobrand data fetch duration between fromDate and toDate value cannot be greater than this value

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.DAILY_DATA_POINT_IN_MONTHS
element.description: Number of past months for which daily data points will be calculated. Zero means current month. If 999 then daily data points will be calculated using all transactions

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.WEEKLY_DATA_POINT_IN_MONTHS
element.description: Number of past months for which weekly data points will be calculated. Zero means current month. If 999 then weekly data points will be calculated using all transactions.

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.MONTHLY_DATA_POINT_IN_MONTHS
element.description: Number of past months for which monthly data points will be calculated. Zero means current month. If 999 then monthly data points will be calculated using all transactions.

element.name: com.yodlee.core.amount.rounding.pattern
element.description: This param acl controls the rounding logic applied to amount fields

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.VAULT_SERVICE.ENABLED
element.description: Config Parameter Key to enable Vault Service for Data Validation. This key is independent SDG Version.

element.name: GENERAL.STATEMENTS_HISTORY_ENABLED
element.description: ACL Key to enable/disable minimum of 24 months transaction history for a cobrand.Default value is False.

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.INVESTMENT.HOLDINGS.QUOTE_FEED.FEATURE.ENABLED
element.description: Feature switch to enable/disable quote feed on Investment Holdings Finapp.Mainly used in Finapp though API will also use it for Investment Holdings product , this key should be enabled

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.QUOTE_FEED.MONGO_SERVICE.ENABLED
element.description: Feature switch to enable/disable MONGO Service for Quote Feed. Used in Investment Holding Finapp. Need to disable for Non US DC. For Investment Holdings product , this key should be enabled

element.name: IPC_REFRESH_ENABLED
element.description: IPC Refresh Enabled for Account Aggregation Flow. Feature switch for IPC. As of now this should be enabled for SC9 only (input from Kirti)

element.name: GENERAL.REFRESH.SDG.MATCHING_SERVICE
element.description: Specifies access Control for SDG Matching Service. If not enabled client will not be able to make a verification API call.

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.VERIFICATION.IAV.MAX_VERIFICATION_LIMIT
element.description: COM.YODLEE.CORE.VERIFICATION.IAV.MAX_VERIFICATION_LIMIT

element.name: com.yodlee.core.oauth_based_aggregation.enabled
element.description: Specifies whether Oauth based aggregation is enabled for this client. This will be applicable for Open Banking & Oauth providers. This is linked to Client on-boarding which would have other steps as well like certificate upload, registration @ provider level, etc.

element.name: com.yodlee.core.popular_sites.feature_switch_enabled
element.description: Specifies popular Sites feature is enabled or not for this client. This utilized only for enabling the Popular section in FL UX & to fetch popular Sites variation in Provider API. Not used in Search Sorting. In YSL Search, sorting default depends on popularity fetched from Reports DB.

element.name: com.yodlee.core.popular_sites.max_pop_sites_to_return
element.description: Specifies maximum number of providers that can be returned by "Provider" API "popular" flavor inclusive of static popular sites configured for client. Dependent on "com.yodlee.core.popular_sites.feature_switch_enabled" & "COM.YODLEE.CORE.POPULAR_SITES.LIST_OF_SITES".

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.REALESTATE.SMART_ZIP.ENABLED
element.description: Feature switch to specify if real estate vendor is SmartZip or not

element.name: GENERAL.REFRESH.SITE_AND_CONTAINER_REFRESH_STATS_TRACKING.ENABLED
element.description: It is used to simplify the refresh tracking at site and container level. The site and container level runtime refresh statuses are stored at SITE_REFRESH_STATS and CONTAINER_REFRESH_STATS respectively for every refresh triggered in the system

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.DBFILER.CLOSEDACCOUNTS.ENABLED
element.description: Feature switch to enable close accounts in case account has been closed at end site

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.DBFILER.CLOSE.NON_PREPOP
element.description: Indicates item accounts status CLOSED or TO_BE_CLOSED for non pre pop accounts

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.DBFILER.CLOSE.PREPOP
element.description: Indicates item accounts status CLOSED or TO_BE_CLOSED for pre pop accounts

element.name: com.yodlee.core.refresh.lost_instantupdate_timeout
element.description: Specifies the time duration after which the refresh would be maarked as timedout.

element.name: com.yodlee.core.add_site.readd_deleted_accounts.enabled
element.description: Specifies whether existing deleted account (item account) will be re-added into the system when the user performs re-adds the site with same credentials.

element.name: com.yodlee.core.site_refresh.enabled
element.description: Specifies user credentials management is done @ Site Level and utilized for aggregating data under this Site for all containers/accounts linked with this credentials and Login URL.

element.name: COM.YODLEE.DC.REFRESH.GATHERER_REQUEST_VERSION
element.description: It helps to determine the data model version to be used by a COBRAND in production environment Product: For new customers it should be true, for migration this may have to be changed

element.name: com.yodlee.core.mfa.enabled
element.description: com.yodlee.core.mfa.enabled

element.name: com.yodlee.core.new_containers_lookup.time_interval_in_sec
element.description: Value for this key is used to determine the time limit after which we should try to lookup for new containers under that site.

element.name: com.yodlee.core.refresh.generic_request_time_limit
element.description: com.yodlee.core.refresh.generic_request_time_limit

element.name: COM.YODLEE.FEATURE_NEW_GATHERER_KEY
element.description: COM.YODLEE.FEATURE_NEW_GATHERER_KEY

element.name: COM.YODLEE.DBFILER.TXN_MATCHING_ACCOUNT_DEDUPLICATION_ENABLED
element.description: Feature switch to specify if the txn matchinglogic should be enabled or not.

element.name: COM.YODLEE.DBFILER.ACCOUNT_DEDUPLICATION.ENABLED
element.description: Feature switch to specify if account deduplication feature is enabled for Cobrand or not.

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.REFRESH.PROGRESSIVE_REFRESH.ENABLED
element.description: Feature switch for enabling/disabling the progressive refresh @ Cobrand level. If enabled transactions if count is more will be sent in batches from gatherer.

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.REFRESH.PROGRESSIVE_REFRESH.SEQUENCING.ENABLED
element.description: This key is to control new feature to reduce latency in PR flow. In this sequential processing of PR responses is achieved by persisting the partial responses in DB and processing it sequentially without blocking the dbfiler threads.

element.name: COM.YODLEE.DBFILER.RECONCILE.CHECK_TRANSACTION.BASED_ON_CHECK_NUMBER_ONLY.ENABLED
element.description: Reconcile check transactions only when check number is matching

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.SSO.FIELDS_TOBE_REPLACED
element.description: Specifies the attributes that are to be massaged during SAML login parsing.

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.SSO.IS_CUSTOMIZED_PREPOP_FLOW_ENABLED
element.description: Specifies customized pre-pop flow for a client is enabled or not.

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.SSO.LOGIN_FIELDS_TOBE_COMPARED
element.description: Specifies the attributes that are to be compared during SAML login parsing.

element.name: com.yodlee.ext.sso.prepop.accounts.readd.after.deletion
element.description: Specifies if the account (item account/item) is deleted by used will e re-added into the system as part of pre-pop flow. Dependent on "com.yodlee.core.canDeletePrepopAccounts".

element.name: com.yodlee.saml.accpop.pref_keys_list_to_delete
element.description: Very specific client implementation key part of SAML login.

element.name: com.yodlee.saml.encrypted_mem_key
element.description: Very specific client implementation key part of SAML login.

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.SAML_AND_HOSTED_TNC
element.description: TNC for SAML client

element.name: com.yodlee.core.fastlink.auto_add_for_prepop.enabled
element.description: Param Key to enable auto addition of containers for a site account which has atleast one pre-pop item.

element.name: com.yodlee.sso.override.default.url
element.description: SAML key

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.SDG.ACCT_PROFILE.DEPENDANCY.BASIC_ACCOUNT_INFO.ENABLED
element.description: Param key to Include/Exclude BASIC_ACCOUNT_INFO dataset attribute form request with ACCOUNT_PROFILE Dataset attribute For new customers it should be true, for migration this may have to be changed

element.name: GENERAL.REFRESH.SDG.CONFIG
element.description: Acl key to enable/disable SDG/SDG tracking feature for a cobrand.Default value is OFF.

element.name: com.yodlee.core.account_number.masking.enable
element.description: Specifies masking feature is enabled for account number attribute.

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.MASK_ACCOUNT_NUMBER
element.description: Specifies base feature switch for masking feature is enabled for account number attribute.

element.name: com.yodlee.core.supress_account_number_masking_for_held_account
element.description: Specifies whether account number masking should be suppressed for Held Accounts. Applicable for Accounts linked to Sites that are marked as HELD for this client. Client would generally be FI's with SAML integration.

element.name: com.yodlee.core.accountnumber.masklength
element.description: Specifies the number of digits that would be masked in account number when account numer is retrieved by client API (Legacy & YSL). This is also utilized in Alerts generated. Dependent & applicable only if 'COM.YODLEE.CORE.MASK_ACCOUNT_NUMBER' key is enabled.

element.name: com.yodlee.core.accountnumber.maskchar
element.description: com.yodlee.core.accountnumber.maskchar

element.name: com.yodlee.core.login.relative_time_to_lock_login
element.description: com.yodlee.core.login.relative_time_to_lock_login

element.name: com.yodlee.core.touch.update_session_interval
element.description: com.yodlee.core.touch.update_session_interval

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.AGGREGATION.ENCRYPT_PROFILE_INFORMATION
element.description: This is the key to determine whether the PII scraped should be encrypted for the cobrand while persisting to DB/decrypting in API response. Possible values: True/False

element.name: COM.YODLEE.COBRAND_PKI.ENABLED
element.description: This key specifies whether credentials passed to add and edit acount APIs should be encrytped or not.

element.name: GENERAL_PUBLICKEY_ATTRIBENCRYPTION_ENABLED
element.description: Access control to publickey based encrytpion on account number in getitemsummaries response

element.name: com.yodlee.security.ingrian.account_credentials.hk1
element.description: com.yodlee.security.ingrian.account_credentials.hk1

element.name: com.yodlee.security.ingrian.account_credentials.hk2
element.description: com.yodlee.security.ingrian.account_credentials.hk2

element.name: com.yodlee.core.fraudulent.switch.enabled
element.description: Decides whether fraudulent user suspend feature is enabled or not

element.name: com.yodlee.core.fraudulent.userSuspend.ifAccountAddition.maxLimit
element.description: Limits the total number of credentials which user can aggregate in our system via ADD operation.

element.name: com.yodlee.core.login.max_login_failure_tolerance
element.description: Specifies the number of attempts User can try with wrong login details. Applicable for non-JWT & non-SAML clients.

element.name: GENERAL_GRANULAR_CATEGORY_ENABLED
element.description: Acl key to enable granular category feature. Granular category being returned by the TDE Webservice will be populated and exposed only if granular category feature is enabled.Granular categories(Refer GRANULAR_CATEGORY, GRANULAR_TXN_CAT_MAP tables) are 221 set of categories introduced to give more granular/detailed level of categorisation which will be tagged to the transactions. This will be in addition to existing master category and high level category.

element.name: com.yodlee.core.login.cobrand_max_login_failure_tolerance
element.description: com.yodlee.core.login.cobrand_max_login_failure_tolerance

element.name: com.yodlee.core.login.cobrand_session_timeout
element.description: Specifies the duration of session timeout for Cobrand Login. Applicable for non JWT based API/APP integration clients.

element.name: com.yodlee.security.useingrian
element.description: com.yodlee.security.useingrian

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.VERIFICATION.IAV.PURGE_ON_REMOVE_TRANSFER_ACCT
element.description: COM.YODLEE.CORE.VERIFICATION.IAV.PURGE_ON_REMOVE_TRANSFER_ACCT

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.VERIFICATION.IAV.PURGE_ON_UNREGISTER
element.description: COM.YODLEE.CORE.VERIFICATION.IAV.PURGE_ON_UNREGISTER

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.VERIFICATION.IAV.SOFT_PURGE_DETAILS
element.description: COM.YODLEE.CORE.VERIFICATION.IAV.SOFT_PURGE_DETAILS

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.VERIFICATION.IAV.PURGE_HELD_AWAY_INFO_GATHERED_FROM_FI
element.description: COM.YODLEE.CORE.VERIFICATION.IAV.PURGE_HELD_AWAY_INFO_GATHERED_FROM_FI

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.VERIFICATION.IAV.PURGE_HELD_AWAY_INFO_ENTERED_BY_USER
element.description: COM.YODLEE.CORE.VERIFICATION.IAV.PURGE_HELD_AWAY_INFO_ENTERED_BY_USER

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.VERIFICATION.IAV.PURGE_ONLINE_CREDENTIALS_ENTERED_BY_USER
element.description: COM.YODLEE.CORE.VERIFICATION.IAV.PURGE_ONLINE_CREDENTIALS_ENTERED_BY_USER

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.REMOVE_ITEM_DELETE_TRANSACTIONS_IN_OFFLINE_MODE
element.description: Cobrandable Param key to control deletion of transaction in offline mode to increase performance of ItemManagement.removeItem(userContext,itemId1) SDK API call.

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.IS_CORE_TNC_MANAGEMENT_ENABLED
element.description: Specfies whether Terms And Conditions is enabled for Client to be displayed for user as part of First Time User Experience.

element.name: COM.YODLEE.SDG.MARK_SERVER_TYPE_AS_V
element.description: key to enable server type from I to V in server_stats table for SDG if only account profile is requested. As of now this should be enabled for IAV only (input from Kirti). Not for AGGR + IAV

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.WEBHOOKS.NOTIFICATION.ENABLED
element.description: Feature switch to enable the webhooks feature

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.WEBHOOKS.NOTIFICATION.VERSION
element.description: This key is used to decide the API Version supported for WEBHOOKS

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.WEBHOOKS.NOTIFICATION.CONTENT_TYPE
element.description: To Indicate WebHooks Notification Content Type

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.YSL.API_VERSION
element.description: This param key is DEPRECATED. Use param_acl key YSL_BASE_API_VERSION for switching of API version

element.name: YSL_BASE_API_VERSION
element.description: switchable key for YSL API Versioning

element.name: containers
element.label: Containers
element.description: List of Containers that should be used by Cobrand.
element.defaultValueNewCustomer: string[]: bank, investment, creditCard, insurance, realEstate, loan, reward

element.name: transactionDays
element.label: Transactions Duration
element.description: Number of days per which, transactions , bills and statements that should be fetched for the cobrand

element.name: docDownloadTypes
element.label: Document Download Types
element.description: Type of Document download that should be enabled for the cobrand

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.POPULAR_SITES.LIST_OF_SITES
element.description: Parameter to configure list of static popular sites for a Cobrand. The List will be comma separated Site IDs of SITE table

element.name: BASIC_AGG_DATA.ACCOUNT_DETAILS.CONFIGS.isProgressSupportEnabled
element.description: BASIC_AGG_DATA.ACCOUNT_DETAILS.CONFIGS.isProgressSupportEnabled

element.name: BASIC_AGG_DATA.STATEMENTS.CONFIGS.firstTimeTxnFetchDuration
element.description: BASIC_AGG_DATA.STATEMENTS.CONFIGS.firstTimeTxnFetchDuration

element.name: BASIC_AGG_DATA.STATEMENTS.CONFIGS.inactiveUserTxnFetchDuration
element.description: BASIC_AGG_DATA.STATEMENTS.CONFIGS.inactiveUserTxnFetchDuration

element.name: BASIC_AGG_DATA.STATEMENTS.CONFIGS.levelOfDetail
element.description: BASIC_AGG_DATA.STATEMENTS.CONFIGS.levelOfDetail

element.name: BASIC_AGG_DATA.TRANSACTIONS.IS_ENABLED
element.description: BASIC_AGG_DATA.TRANSACTIONS.IS_ENABLED

element.name: BASIC_AGG_DATA.TRANSACTIONS.IS_IMPLICIT_IN_REQUEST
element.description: BASIC_AGG_DATA.TRANSACTIONS.IS_IMPLICIT_IN_REQUEST

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.SDG.DATA.MODEL
element.description: This param acl is to control Declob changes and it can have 3 values 1) OLD : Populating and consumption from only old table 2) OLD-AND-NEW - Populating into both OLD and NEW tables and Consumption from only old table 3) NEW - Data will not populated into old clob columns and consumption is also from new table

element.name: BASIC_AGG_DATA.TRANSACTIONS.CONFIGS.firstTimeTxnFetchDuration
element.description: BASIC_AGG_DATA.TRANSACTIONS.CONFIGS.firstTimeTxnFetchDuration

element.name: GENERAL.REFRESH_RESPONSE_TRACKER
element.description: ACL Key to enable/disable scheduler based response consolidation for a cobrand.Default value is False.

element.name: BASIC_AGG_DATA.TRANSACTIONS.CONFIGS.txnForSecurityDataEnrichment
element.description: BASIC_AGG_DATA.TRANSACTIONS.CONFIGS.txnForSecurityDataEnrichment

element.name: BASIC_AGG_DATA.TRANSACTIONS.CONFIGS.inactiveUserTxnFetchDuration
element.description: BASIC_AGG_DATA.TRANSACTIONS.CONFIGS.inactiveUserTxnFetchDuration

element.name: INSTANT_ACCOUNT_VERIFICATION.SCRAPE_STANDARD_ROUTING_NUMBER.ENABLED
element.description: Config Parameter Key to scrape Standard Routing Number for a given cobrand.

element.name: ICE_SUPPORTED_CONTAINERS
element.description: ACL Key to check ICE supported containers. Default value for this key is null. Null value indicates that ICE is not enabled for any of the container. Comma separated containers will be there for which ICE will be called

element.name: ICE_APPLY_TDE_FOR_INCREMENTAL_TXNS
element.description: ACL Key to enable the TDE enrichment during cache refresh

element.name: ICE_ON_DEMAND_TXN_DURATION_MIN_INTERVAL
element.description: ACL Key to configure minimum duration required between start date to end date to retrieve the transactions for ICE enrichment during on demand API call

element.name: ICE_ON_DEMAND_TXN_DURATION_MAX_INTERVAL
element.description: ACL Key to configure maximum duration required between start date to end date to retrieve the transactions for ICE enrichment during on demand API call

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.T2H.ENABLED
element.description: This is key to control RealTime T2H in platform during account refresh for investment transactions and is applicable for IDE and RECON enabled cobrands

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.DATA_EXTRACTS.EXCLUDED_BDF_SUMINFO_LIST
element.description: Data extracts events notifications will be disabled for BDF requests for the provided list of suminfos. This is used in YSL and Alert Component

element.name: IPC_GATHERER_HANDLE_NO_OF_RETRY
element.description: key to enable number of default retry count if gatherer did not give IPC handle

element.name: COM.YODLEE.CORE.SMALL_BUSINESS_2.0.ENABLED
element.description: This key is used to enable or disable the Small Business Two Feature at Dbfiler and ysl

element.name: YODLEE.CLOUD.AWS.SQS.ROUTE.ENABLED
element.description: This param acl is to route request to Amazon SQS Queue

element.name: BASIC_AGG_DATA.BASIC_ACCOUNT_INFO
IS_ENABLED
element.description: IS_ENABLED

element.name: IMPLICIT_IN_REQUEST
element.description: IMPLICIT_IN_REQUEST

element.name: IS_CACHE_REFRESH_SUPRT_EN

element.name: TAX
IS_AUTO_DWNLD_SUPRT_EN
element.description: Enabling key for downloading tax related document

element.name: IS_ONDEMAND_SUPRT_EN
element.description: Enabling key to allow tax document download on demand request by client

element.name: IS_AUTO_DWNLD_ADDACC_EN
element.description: Enabling key for downloading tax related document during add account flow

element.name: IS_ACCT_ENROLL_EN
element.description: Not applicable for TAX key

element.name: IS_RETRY_FOR_ONDEMAND_EN
element.description: Enabling key to allow retry downloading tax related document in case of download failure for client on demand download request

element.name: IS_HARDELETE_DOC_SUPRT_EN
element.description: Enabling key to allow hard deleting tax related document

element.name: ADDACC_DWNLD_DUR_IN_DAYS
element.description: Key to denote download duration in days of tax information during add account flow

element.name: DWNLD_DURATION_IN_DAYS
element.description: Key to denote download duration in days of tax information during refresh flow

element.name: IMPLICIT_IN_REQUEST
element.description: Enabling key for downloading tax related document by default, client does not need to send as part of rquest

element.name: CONTAINER_SUPRT_EN
element.description: Configuration key provides containers list and related information like frequency for tax document download

element.name: DOC_IMPLICIT_SOURCE_ID
element.description: key to denote implicit source id for tax document download
Used by DocumentManagementService, they generally 26AS and 1099/1098 forms, etc

element.name: STMT
IS_AUTO_DWNLD_SUPRT_EN
element.description: Enabling key for downloading statement related document

element.name: IS_ONDEMAND_SUPRT_EN
element.description: Enabling key to allow Statement document download on demand request by client

element.name: IS_AUTO_DWNLD_ADDACC_EN
element.description: Enabling key for downloading statement related document during add account flow

element.name: IS_ACCT_ENROLL_EN
element.description: Not applicable for STMT key

element.name: IS_RETRY_FOR_ONDEMAND_EN
element.description: Enabling key to allow retry downloading statement related document in case of download failure for client on demand download request

element.name: IS_HARDELETE_DOC_SUPRT_EN
element.description: Enabling key to allow hard deleting statement related document

element.name: ADDACC_DWNLD_DUR_IN_DAYS
element.description: Key to denote download duration in days of statement information during add account flow

element.name: DWNLD_DURATION_IN_DAYS
element.description: Key to denote download duration in days of statement information during refresh flow

element.name: IMPLICIT_IN_REQUEST
element.description: Enabling key for downloading statement related document by default, client does not need to send as part of rquest

element.name: CONTAINER_SUPRT_EN
element.description: Configuration key provides containers list and related information like frequency for statement document download

element.name: DOC_IMPLICIT_SOURCE_ID
element.description: key to denote implicit source id for statement document download
Used by DocumentManagementService represents all statements such as bank/credit card statement, etc

element.name: EBILL
IS_AUTO_DWNLD_SUPRT_EN
element.description: Enabling key for downloading bill related document

element.name: IS_ONDEMAND_SUPRT_EN
element.description: Enabling key to allow Bill document download on demand request by client

element.name: IS_AUTO_DWNLD_ADDACC_EN
element.description: Enabling key for downloading bill related document during add account flow

element.name: IS_ACCT_ENROLL_EN
element.description: Enabling key for Account Enrollment

element.name: IS_RETRY_FOR_ONDEMAND_EN
element.description: Enabling key to allow retry downloading bill related document in case of download failure for client on demand download request

element.name: IS_HARDELETE_DOC_SUPRT_EN
element.description: Enabling key to allow hard deleting bill related document

element.name: ADDACC_DWNLD_DUR_IN_DAYS
element.description: Key to denote download duration in days of bill information during add account flow

element.name: DWNLD_DURATION_IN_DAYS
element.description: Key to denote download duration in days of bill information during refresh flow

element.name: IMPLICIT_IN_REQUEST
element.description: Enabling key for downloading bill related document by default, client does not need to send as part of rquest

element.name: CONTAINER_SUPRT_EN
element.description: Configuration key provides containers list and related information like frequency for bill document download

element.name: DOC_IMPLICIT_SOURCE_ID
element.description: key to denote implicit source id for bill document download
Used by DocumentManagementService represents ability to download all the bills from utility sites such as telephone bill, etc
